content: Does everyone just mute all streams/topics they're not interested in? I feel I can never make the number of unread messages go down
You can unsubscribe from streams you don't want to follow
yeah I unsubscrube from many and mute most of the rest
I sometimes get subscribed soemwhere when people mention me; that's fine, but then I tend to mute the stream if it happens several times because I dont want to see all messages, just mentions
yeah, i just mute most of them
I have everything muted except for #wg-traits and some other smaller streams I might be interested in
I actively mute topics in #wg-traits that I am not involved in
i also aggressively mute active topics that i don't expect to want to follow
it would be nice to unmute some topics in an otherwise muted stream
like when I got mentioned and replied
I think I opened a feature request for that a while ago
